name: Store Locator
author: Fudugo Team

sections.description:
Store Locator is the most comprehensive WordPress Store Locator/Finder Plugin that offers you immediate access to all the stores in your local area with leaflet Maps. You can add unlimited stores with this stores. It enables you to find the very best stores and accurate geolocation about each store that suits a customer inquiry.

1.Easy to Configure
Change templates, marker styles, map languages, address formats and more on the settings page.

2.Works in Any Country
Customers can search for stores in any country around the world.

3.Shortcodes
Choose page to show the store locator and add shortcode [fssl-store-locator], a simple store map, the address details or the opening hours.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/fssl-store-locator directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. OR Go to Plugins -> Click on Add New -> Click on Upload Plugin and upload zip file of plugin.
sections.faq:
Do this plugin work with woocommerce?

No, It’s not work with woocommerce.
